SELECT c.comany_type_id, c.chinesename, c.engname, c.russianname, c.chineseaddress, c.engaddress, c.postcode, c.tel, c.fax, c.website, c.email, c.jobtitle, c.principal, c.industryid, c.busscope, c.hopecustomers, c.companyprofile, ifnull(c.companyprofile,'') companyprofile, c.purchaseintention, c.exhibitors_nature_id, c.buslicensepath, c.companypicture, c.companyvideo, c.companypictures, c.relateddocumentspath, c.exhibits, c.organizationcode, c.id companyId, c.chinesename, c.contactperson, c.phone, ifnull(d.chinese_name,'') companyNature, c.addtime, c.useable, c.url, c.legalpersonname, c.legalpersoncardnumber, c.audit_status auditStatus, case c.audit_status when 1 then '待审核' when 2 then '审核成功' when 3 then '审核拒绝' end as auditStatusName, ifnull(c.audittime,'') audittime, c.audit_remark auditRemark, c.auditername FROM web_member a LEFT JOIN web_member_session b on a.member_id = b.member_id and b.id = #{session} RIGHT JOIN ebs_companyinfo c on b.orgnization_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_company_type d on c.exhibitors_nature_id = d.id and d.use_flag = 'Y' WHERE a.member_type = 3 and a.member_status = 0
and c.audit_status = 1
and c.audit_status = 2
and c.audit_status = 3

SELECT count(DISTINCT c.id) EnterprisesNumber, count(DISTINCT d.id) certificatesTotalNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) pendingAuditNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN status = -1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) failedAuditNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) ReviewedCertificatesNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN printstatus = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) Printed, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (status = 1 and isplastic = 1 and printstatus = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) noPrinted, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN isgreen = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) greenChannelCertificatesNumber FROM web_member a LEFT JOIN web_member_session b on a.member_id = b.member_id LEFT JOIN ebs_companyinfo c on b.orgnization_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ebs_personnelcard d on d.companyname = c.chinesename AND b.id = d.session WHERE a.member_type = #{type} AND b.id = #{session} and a.member_status = 0 and c.useable = 1
